Package jodd.db

Simple and safe database access.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DbSessionProvider
    Provide DbSession when requested by DbQuery.
    QueryMapper<T>
    Process query and map it execution result to a type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbCallResult
    Result of a CALL statement.
    DbDetector
    Database detector and DbOom configurator.
    DbOom
    Starting class that all DBOOM starts from.
    DbOom.Builder  
    DbQuery<Q extends DbQuery>
    Encapsulates Statement and all its operations.
    DbQueryConfig
    Db query default configuration.
    DbSession
    Encapsulates db connection.
    DbThreadSession
    Thread assigned DbSession.
    DbTransactionMode
    Native SQL transaction mode for DbSession transactions.
    DbUtil
    Various DB utilities.
    ThreadDbSessionHolder
    DbSession thread storage.
    ThreadDbSessionProvider
    Returns DbSession assigned to current thread.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QueryConcurrencyType
    Query concurrency type.
    QueryHoldability
    Query holdability.
    QueryScrollType
    Query scroll type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DbSqlException
    Unchecked SQL exception.

Package jodd.db Description

Simple and safe database access.
